document_data.name: Hommil Dundreth
document_data.mainbody:
'''Hommil Dundreth''' was a merchant and author from [[Hlintar]], a settlement in [[the Vast]]. Hommil was known as the Merchant-Mage of Hlintar.{{Cite web/The Candlekeep Collection}}

At some point, Hommil wrote the book ''[[Lines on the North]]''. The original manuscript was kept in [[Candlekeep]] by [[1372 DR]].
